channel.title: 317 Battlescape source Help (commands,shops)
channel.description: Hey can somebody please post the codes for if i were to make a command such as ::train? remmember this is for battlescape source 317. just like nocturnal pk. and same for shops. I no how to do autospawn and shops but is there anything else? and please explain what i gotta do very carefully cuz im new at coding and i wud really appreciate the help thanks again!
